mapper.select: select distinct T_ENG_TABLE_NAME as ATBL /*TOBE테이블영문명*/ , T_KOR_TABLE_NAME as ATBLNM /*TOBE테이블한글명*/ , A_ENG_TABLE_NAME as TBL /*ASIS테이블영문명*/ , A_KOR_TABLE_NAME as TBLNM /*ASIS테이블한글명*/ from META_TABLE_MAP WHERE T_ENG_TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL AND A_ENG_TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL

/* IO:mm.repository.mapper.SqlTranInqMapper.S002 */ SELECT IFNULL(T_ENG_TABLE_NAME ,'NULL') AS ATBL /*TOBE테이블영문명*/ ,IFNULL(T_KOR_TABLE_NAME,'NULL') AS ATBLNM /*TOBE테이블한글명*/ ,IFNULL(T_ENG_COLUMN_NAME,'NULL') AS ACOL /*TOBE컬럼영문명*/ ,IFNULL(T_KOR_COLUMN_NAME,'NULL') AS ACOLNM /*TOBE컬럼한글명*/ ,IFNULL(A_ENG_TABLE_NAME,'NULL') AS TBL /*ASIS테이블영문명*/ ,IFNULL(A_KOR_TABLE_NAME,'NULL') AS TBLNM /*ASIS테이블한글명*/ ,IFNULL(A_ENG_COLUMN_NAME,'NULL') AS COL /*ASIS컬럼영문명*/ ,IFNULL(A_KOR_COLUMN_NAME,'NULL') AS COLNM /*ASIS컬럼한글명*/ FROM META_TABLE_MAP WHERE A_ENG_TABLE_NAME IN (${ASIS_TBL_LIST}) AND T_ENG_TABLE_NAME IN (${TOBE_TBL_LIST}) AND A_ENG_COLUMN_NAME IS NOT NULL AND T_ENG_COLUMN_NAME IS NOT NULL ORDER BY T_ENG_TABLE_NAME, LENGTH(A_ENG_COLUMN_NAME) DESC
